description: PriorityClass defines mapping from a priority class name to the priority integer value. The value can be any valid integer.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

description.description: An arbitrary string that usually provides guidelines on using this PriorityClass.

globalDefault.description: Flag indicating whether this PriorityClass should be considered as the default priority for Pods.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

value.description: The value of this priority class. This is the actual priority that Pods receive when they have the name of this class in their Pod spec.
